title: RockSampleAnalysis
description: The meta-data about a rock sample analysis related to core or outcrop rock samples.

WellboreID.title: Wellbore ID
WellboreID.description: Unique wellbore identifier. Required when RockSampleAnalysis does not have relationship with master-data Core.  E.g. analysis for sidewall core.

CoringID.title: Coring ID
CoringID.description: Identifies the Core on which this batch of analysis was performed.

RockSampleID.title: Rock Sample ID
RockSampleID.description: Identifies the RockSample on which this batch of analysis was performed.

VerticalMeasurement.title: Vertical Measurement
VerticalMeasurement.description: References an entry in the VerticalMeasurements array for the Wellbore identified by WellboreID, or a standalone vertical reference which defines the vertical reference datum for all measured depths of the RockSample record. If this is not populated, the VerticalMeasurement is derived from the Coring.

AnalysisDate.description: The date the batch of rock sample analysis was performed.

TopDepth.description: The first depth index from the analysis result.

BottomDepth.description: The last depth index from the analysis result.

DepthShiftsID.title: Depth Shifts ID
DepthShiftsID.description: The WellLog representation carrying the core-depth to logging-depth correction or mapping used or to be used with this analysis.

RoutineCoreAnalysis.title: Routine Core Analysis
RoutineCoreAnalysis.description: Conditions and results of a routine core analysis.

RCAMeasurements.title: RCA Measurements
RCAMeasurements.description: The conditions under which this analysis has been carried out

Conditions.title: Conditions
Conditions.description: The conditions under which this analysis has been carried out

Pressure.title: Pressure
Pressure.description: The pressure condition for the analysis.

Temperature.title: Temperature
Temperature.description: The temperature condition for the analysis.

PressureMeasurementTypeID.title: Pressure Measurement Type ID
PressureMeasurementTypeID.description: Identifies the environment where the pressure was measured. E.g. Ambient, Overburden

MeanPressure.title: Mean Pressure
MeanPressure.description: The average pressure in which the gas permeability has been measured.

PorePressure.title: Pore Pressure
PorePressure.description: The pressure of the fluid in the pore space.

OtherMeasurements.title: Other Measurements
OtherMeasurements.description: Other measurements made in the context of this analysis

items.title: AbstractSpecification
items.description: An array element of an analysis specifying the numeric, text or date-time value associated with a ParameterType.

EffectiveDateTime.description: The date and time at which this specification becomes effective.

TerminationDateTime.description: The first point in time when this specification is no longer in effect.

SpecificationQuantity.description: The numeric value of the parameter.

SpecificationDate.description: The date value of the parameter.

SpecificationDateTime.description: The date and time value of the parameter.

SpecificationIndicator.description: The indicator value of the parameter.

SpecificationText.description: The text value of the parameter.

SpecificationTime.description: The time value of the parameter.

UnitOfMeasureID.description: The unit for the quantity parameter, like metre (m in SI units system) for quantity Length.

ParameterTypeID.description: Parameter representing a property or characteristic.

Remarks.title: Analysis Remarks
Remarks.description: An array containing operational or quality comments pertaining to a rock sample analysis.

items.title: Remark
items.description: An array containing narrative remarks pertaining to a rock sample analysis.

RemarkID.title: Remark ID
RemarkID.description: A unique identifier for each remark record.

Remark.title: Remark
Remark.description: A descriptive comment for this remark.

RemarkSource.title: Remark Source
RemarkSource.description: The person, vendor, interpreter or other provider of information.

PermeabilityMeasurementTypeID.title: Permeability Measurement Type ID
PermeabilityMeasurementTypeID.description: The measurement type used to obtain the Permeability values.

PorosityMeasurementTypeID.title: Porosity Measurement Type ID
PorosityMeasurementTypeID.description: The measurement type used to obtain the Porosity values.

GrainDensityMeasurementTypeID.title: Grain Density Measurement Type ID
GrainDensityMeasurementTypeID.description: The measurement type used to obtain the GrainDensity value.

SaturationOil.title: Saturation Oil
SaturationOil.description: The fraction of oil volume compared to the total pore volume.

SaturationWater.title: Saturation Water
SaturationWater.description: The fraction of water volume compared to the total pore volume.

SaturationGas.title: Saturation Gas
SaturationGas.description: The fraction of gas volume compared to the total pore volume.

SaturationMethodTypeID.title: Saturation Method Type ID
SaturationMethodTypeID.description: The saturation method type, like Dean Stark, Retort, Karl Fischer.

WeightOfSalt.title: Weight Of Salt
WeightOfSalt.description: The weight of salt in the brine, needed in conjunction with SaturationWater.

LaboratoryName.description: Name or branch of the laboratory performing the analysis.

AnalysisOrganisationID.description: Identifies the Organisation that produces/produced this analysis.

SampleOrientationID.description: The de-normalized Sample Orientation derived from the RockSample.

Remarks.title: Analysis Remarks
Remarks.description: An array containing operational or quality comments pertaining to a rock sample analysis.

items.title: Remark
items.description: An array containing narrative remarks pertaining to a rock sample analysis.

RemarkID.title: Remark ID
RemarkID.description: A unique identifier for each remark record.

Remark.title: Remark
Remark.description: A descriptive comment for this remark.

RemarkSource.title: Remark Source
RemarkSource.description: The person, vendor, interpreter or other provider of information.
